comments:
You get the message after you reload an EJP Project.
This problem happens  both on window and linux, found while retested RATLC548251. After following steps in the description, Saved the workspace, exited, reloaded the same workspace, error messages.

Steps: 
1.Create a EJB Project, accept all default settings
2.Once the project is created, add a new Entity Bean, accept all default setting so the wizard will create a Class diagram
3.Once the class diagram is create and the Entity Bean is shown, right click on the Bean and select Add EJB-> CMP Fields
4.Enter in the name ?test? type set to Java.lang.character
5.Click Apply and closed. Diagram gets updated with new field
6.Now from the main menu select ?Edit-> Undo New CMP Fields
7. Save the workspace, Exit application.
8. Reload the same workspace, error messages in log file.

Boris -- have you seen this NPE with the saveables service? From looking at the log, I do not believe that the saveables services is the culprit; it looks like it's just having trouble locating a file that may not have been properly created. 

John -- this looks like a bug in either WTP (perhaps the facet wizard?) or something higher. There is product code in the stack, which may indicate this a problem that only occurs in adopter environments. Could you investigate?
